BEACTIVE_Metadata.title: BeActive - Stay Fit, Stay Healthy
BEACTIVE_Metadata.description: Join BeActive to track your fitness journey, set goals, and connect with a community of health enthusiasts.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It may have been deleted, renamed, or doesn't exist.

businessCard.title: Register your sport
businessCard.description: Whether you're a sports club, association or event organizer, we help you register your sport to be more accessible to athletes.

listServices.title: List services and prices
listServices.description: Athletes can easily see your services and prices.

reachAthletes.title: Reach more athletes
reachAthletes.description: Increase your sports club's visibility through our platform.

seeStats.title: See detailed statistics
seeStats.description: Monitor the performance and engagement of athletes in the club.
